channel.title: Favorite Game of the Year
channel.description: It's The Gauntlet Podcast's year-end episode with picks from almost two dozen community members for the ttrpg they enjoyed most this year. It's a wild and varied array with choices new and old. Thanks to everyone who participated; a super imaginative set of picks from all of you. It's our episode which gets the most downloads each year and we hope points folks to some new games. Check it out here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/favorite-games-of-2019

item.title: Favorite Game of the Year
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

It’s The Gauntlet Podcast’s year-end episode with picks from almost two dozen community members for the ttrpg they enjoyed most this year. It’s a wild and varied array with choices new and old. Thanks to everyone who participated; a super imaginative set of picks from all of you. It’s our episode which gets the most downloads each year and we hope points folks to some new games.
Check it out here:

THE GAUNTLET

Favorite Games of 2019

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss
